Title: The Shame Wizard
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Victor Quinaz
Actors: Fred Armisen, Jessica Chaffin, Kat Dennings, Richard Kind
Plot: As Nick tries to figure out whether he has a shot with Gina, a mortifying encounter with Leah sends Andrew into a spiral of shame.
